wiki.summary: "Cosmic" is a song by South Korean girl group Red Velvet. Released on June 24, 2024, it serves as the title track for their ninth mini-album, "Cosmic," under SM Entertainment. "Cosmic" is a dance-pop song infused with retro synth elements, delivering a vibrant and nostalgic auditory experience. The track is characterized by its use of synth strings and a pulsating disco rhythm, creating an energetic backdrop that complements the whimsical and enchanting nature of its lyrics. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Cosmic" is a song by South Korean girl group Red Velvet. Released on June 24, 2024, it serves as the title track for their ninth mini-album, "Cosmic," under SM Entertainment. "Cosmic" is a dance-pop song infused with retro synth elements, delivering a vibrant and nostalgic auditory experience. The track is characterized by its use of synth strings and a pulsating disco rhythm, creating an energetic backdrop that complements the whimsical and enchanting nature of its lyrics. The song narrates a fantastical journey, inviting listeners to embark on a rhythmic voyage through the solar system, encapsulating themes of adventure and cosmic love. The lyrics of "Cosmic" delve into the experience of meeting a lonely traveler who crash-lands on a metaphorical representation of Red Velvet. Through this encounter, the group explores the idea of infinite love, drawing parallels between the vastness of the universe and the boundless nature of love. The imagery evoked in the song is both vivid and imaginative, painting a picture of a fairytale-like exploration of space and emotion. In an interview on December 31, 2023, Red Velvet announced their plans to release a special album in 2024 to commemorate their 10th anniversary. This announcement built significant anticipation among fans and the media. On February 8, 2024, SM Entertainment further revealed that Red Velvet would be releasing a mini-album in the latter half of the year, heightening the excitement for their upcoming project. Subsequently, on May 4, 2024, it was confirmed that the mini-album would be released at the end of June. Finally, on June 10, 2024, the official announcement came that the ninth mini-album, "Cosmic," would be available on June 24. This strategic buildup culminated in the highly anticipated release of "Cosmic," which quickly became a fan favorite. The release of "Cosmic" not only highlighted Red Velvet's versatility in blending contemporary and retro musical elements but also showcased their ability to craft compelling narratives through their music. The song's unique concept and captivating sound have solidified its place in Red Velvet's discography as a standout track, further cementing their legacy in the K-pop industry. Read more on Last.fm.
